'''Regeneration''' is a [[status effect]] that restores an [[entity]]'s health over time.

== Effect ==
The amount of [[health]] healed over time is shown in the table below:
{| class="wikitable" style="text-align:right"
 ! Level !! Ticks per {{hp|1|notag=1}} !! {{hp|1|notag=1}} per second
 |-
 | 1 || 50 || {{hp|0.4}}
 |-
 | 2 || 25 || {{hp|0.8}}
 |-
 | 3 || 12 || {{hp|1.67}}
 |-
 | 4 || 6 || {{hp|3.33}}
 |-
 | 5 || 3 || {{hp|6.67}}
 |-
 | 6+ || 1 || {{hp|20}}
|}
Amplifiers outside the range 0–31 (corresponding to levels 1–32) are used {{W|Modular arithmetic|modulo}} 32, making level 33 the same as level 1, etc.

==Immune mobs==
*[[Ender dragon]]s are immune to Regeneration.
*[[Mob]]s and [[player]]s that have full health are unaffected by regeneration.
*[[Mob]]s in the {{cd|ignores_poison_and_regen}} [[entity tag]]{{only|java}} or the {{cd|undead}} [[family]]{{only|bedrock}} are immune to Regeneration.
